description: Books; articles: https://t.co/AOdtXKVYWQ; films; https://t.co/dk8MZPUCS9
text: A long essay on The Meaning of Life https://t.co/UIxxEvxeFa @BrianJHuser @chickenpaprika  I hope you feel better now! How to tell the Story of our Life https://t.co/PAXhgIOKNQ The distress at the difference between the way we look, and the way we feel: https://t.co/uBemSHMHLi via @YouTube What separates hope from despair is a different way of telling a story from the same facts. "What need is there to weep over parts of life? The whole of it calls for tears" - Seneca The very healthy haven't escaped: they're just dying more slowly. A decisive barrier to the more meaningful lives we seek is the half-formed suspicion that we may be immortal. The Importance of Selfishness https://t.co/Tb6VbR6SPm Why, how & when to Flirt https://t.co/rqG17R5XHp via @YouTube RT @bruffinator: Five stars for The Course of Love by @alaindebotton. Wish it had been published a year or two earlier! Better late than ne… @paulnugent6 https://t.co/J6F2jag8oz ‘Romantic realism’: the seven rules to help you avoid divorce https://t.co/bgnQmWT55D The disappearance of keyboards from phones: turning us into passive consumers who tap, not creators who type. Why Self-Analysis works https://t.co/MPfwl3vTJS Glimpsing someone else's to-do list - like watching them sleeping - tends always to be endearing. The Importance of Music https://t.co/hU9jPuD5xx The Importance of Books https://t.co/riiRjkhVEL The greatest obstacle to having a meaningful life is the sense one has too much life left. On Taking Drugs https://t.co/tVg5AlyyrZ RT @TheSchoolOfLife: A guide to keeping your cool even in testing circumstances: https://t.co/ktLOM65JSv https://t.co/v0iuB1lPHj The serious business of choosing clothes: https://t.co/Z6pAmrYt8L https://t.co/LTrL9bRRxF The Joys of Sport https://t.co/mcKD5TpGaw The Purpose of Friendship https://t.co/ehWKoNVz8U via @YouTube Why we do - after all - care about Politics https://t.co/ABlX7moyii Machiavelli's Advice for Nice Guys prone to finishing last: https://t.co/Mw5eNNEeDk https://t.co/PVGv8ROnzJ How to Travel in your Mind https://t.co/nDemrDHWkH Why we need to work (because we're 'controlling', for good reasons): https://t.co/lbJ92HhLBR https://t.co/udXWhKiwKF The clue to dieting: ensuring (not always easy) one has more exciting things to do than eat. For civilisation to endure, Wisdom has to keep pace with Technology. Futurologists try to deduce what the future will be like; philosophers imagine what it should be like:… https://t.co/hmywMoBvXS Our successors will probably pity us as much as we pity Medieval people with toothache: https://t.co/ysu2LtlC9P Some 130 million books have been published in history; a big reader will get through 6,000 in a lifetime. Choose carefully... Why we need to create a Home https://t.co/RpVCwiWa5s Why We Should Draw More (and Photograph Less) https://t.co/C0EpmChJci via @YouTube A secret to appreciating life is to make more of memories: https://t.co/nDemrDHWkH via @YouTube Old friends matter: they are the guardians of our past: https://t.co/A2esxsanEv In praise of networking: https://t.co/DvzUvEJOv7 https://t.co/JIE69hiWSe Creativity is way too important to be left to artists: https://t.co/6pyFCjI933 https://t.co/sQD2TGHkIv The Pleasure of Order https://t.co/pA7ya5eQ2o In Praise of Teamwork https://t.co/WAIBtrHpy1 The longing for Authentic Work https://t.co/gEOUHyaBZe How and why parenting matters: https://t.co/2byosZsIx8 https://t.co/8xSI2U10Wc To be a parent is to be chief designer of a product more advanced than any technology and more interesting than the greatest work of art. On work-life balance: when you find work you enjoy, it ceases to be the enemy of life. Why Family Matters https://t.co/d7tYXYRbXT What is Love? https://t.co/yMn4Qzacr9 Why Love requires Generosity https://t.co/COaceMXMDx via @YouTube Spotting what's wrong with someone is a familiar, easy and painfully unrewarding game. We might try a bit of imaginative empathy instead. RT @HamishH1931: Just in: first new book of the new year -- @PenguinUKBooks paperback of @alaindebotton's THE COURSE OF LOVE https://t.co/N… Loneliness so often goes unmentioned: those without anyone feel shame, those with someone (a background) guilt. An essay on the ingredients of Calm https://t.co/4g3HAqzMsj RT @TheSchoolOfLife: Welcome your friends into the new year with our pessimistic greetings cards. An antidote to over-optimism: https://t.c… We're all experts at lying - not so much to others - as to ourselves: https://t.co/9Opon1G9z8 via @YouTube These are the days for 'Torschlusspanik', German transl. lit. 'gate-shut-panic' i.e, time is running the hell out. Striving to be more interesting than another's smartphone is a battle we should gracefully accept as lost. Why You Can Change The World https://t.co/U3N6OjqmWU We maintain a stubborn faith in the idea of a 'normal' relationship which, on close examination, it turns out no one in fact has. However appalling death is, it does at least offer last ditch deliverance from many an otherwise unbudgable baddie. That resolutions get broken is no argument for not making them. https://t.co/kKwIrfOjcb Being a bit embarrassed by who we were at the start of 2016 is only a sign we learnt a few things. The last @theschooloflife film of 2016: a small invitation to change the world (for the better): https://t.co/e0tweYtTXg via @YouTube The recurring fantasy: to be able to rewind time to the moment before the big mistakes started to be made. Stay or Leave a relationship? https://t.co/HKrNGqB9hu Why Germans can say things no one else can https://t.co/ubAnpwOxM9 Aphorisms on Confidence https://t.co/zm6Gg2A1V4 Aphorisms on Kindness https://t.co/TV8PFBlHSn Thoreau and Civil Disobedience https://t.co/exsUTOsZLU How not to be Angry all the Time https://t.co/HAtch7dyg7 via @YouTube It’s always necessary - yet a bit surprising - to have to take a moment to remind ourselves that perfect people don’t exist. If we saw someone else treating us the way most of us treat ourselves, we might think them despicably cruel. We should do ourselves the favour of not always thinking too well of our enemies. We get down to work when the fear of doing something rather badly is overwhelmed by the greater (better) fear of doing nothing at all. @oh_fudge @TheSchoolOfLife To start you off: https://t.co/IEnPwgKaCG @cotcodac @TheSchoolOfLife Do take a look at https://t.co/sZ06QEcUzC A fantastic question. Does @UBS have a good set of answers? https://t.co/6ZnzJ3IGsC How to Get Over Someone https://t.co/5h3PQ6L1tl @loumcbarnes @TheSchoolOfLife We have lots of free content here: https://t.co/ozqdboCHAS @memneon @TheSchoolOfLife We have this: https://t.co/AUIOxTTn1V @cyberoo @TheSchoolOfLife Thanks, for the moment we have https://t.co/aMEDr0YnyD We have this news addict's tool: https://t.co/wAFx5Trvth @danmonaghan @TheSchoolOfLife We have this tool: https://t.co/wAFx5Trvth @Rich_Pilkington @TheSchoolOfLife If you can make it to mid-Wales, we have: https://t.co/AUIOxTTn1V @aichmarieT @TheSchoolOfLife Great idea: we have https://t.co/aMEDr0YnyD and https://t.co/ozqdboCHAS @stuarttilbury @TheSchoolOfLife We run these in London regularly: https://t.co/izj1bJ1vTG @spencercheats Great idea: this is a start: https://t.co/fYM1JtgSOF @RaiDevon @TheSchoolOfLife We just launched an imprint: https://t.co/hJkm4G7dZ1 @ACuriousDelight @TheSchoolOfLife We have this guide for you: https://t.co/j8i0AldbT6 @charmermark @TheSchoolOfLife We have a version of this here: https://t.co/AUIOxTTn1V @HelenBunker @TheSchoolOfLife Thanks - in the meantime, do check out https://t.co/aMEDr0YnyD @jamesmullan01 @TheSchoolOfLife We'll work on it! In the meantime:  https://t.co/jALmYYT4WN @KristyT @TheSchoolOfLife A version of that is on the way for the spring. If @TheSchoolOfLife could launch anything in 2017, what would it be? We'd live so differently, perhaps more wisely, if we put the things we worry about in the night squarely in the middle of our days. A small guide to rising above things: https://t.co/uvvRaEfOtW via @YouTube RT @SLSA: #ourfavouritereadsin2016 The Course of Love @alaindebotton Exploring love & everyday difficulties By my favourite living philosop… Jesus's take on why we could love (more or less) anyone. https://t.co/U3IIp0KJvC Christmas provides the perfect excuse for that otherwise forbidden wish: to be kind to complete strangers. RT @nytimes: Our most read piece of 2016 is from @nytopinion: Why you will marry the wrong person https://t.co/FASeH7sloZ https://t.co/26Kr… Most people just follow prevailing norms; very few create them; and very very few create good ones.

description: Welcome to the McDonald’s USA Twitter page! Customer Service: @Reachout_mcd - Global questions: @McDonaldsCorp
text: @jaylarsenn Can someone deliver our friend a tasty snack? @valeriagperiban We’d love to see you! Promise to visit us soon? :) @_kenndogg We can totally help you out with your Sweet Tea craving! Come by soon! @LexMae2525 What a coincidence! All we want is to see your awesome face! See you soon? @lolashlynnn Come on by — we have plenty to share! :) @mirandaspeerrrr On a real note: Who's going to be kind and help out our friend! @_sarabaker_ RUN, don’t walk, to the nearest McDonald’s! @annaemoseley Who’s going to step up? Be our friend's hero today! :) @karracuda77 We are always craving the opportunity to see more of you and your friends, Kara. See you soon? @mnponiatowski Feed the need, Megan! Hope to see you soon with your best friends. @Vicctoriouss Treat yourself, Vickie! You’ve earned it. :) @dria876 Come on over and satisfy that craving! See you soon? @_kaaitlynnhall We like where you're going with this, pal! Swing by soon? @1chynad0ll We can hear your hunger pangs from here! Someone help our pal out! @lysandragarciaa What are you waiting for, we'd love to see you! Stop by and visit us. :) @Madison_M123456 Sounds good to us! We are always craving the opportunity to see more of you. :) @gabrielat00 Thanks for joining us today, Gabriela! We hope you enjoyed your meal and your time with us. @jbedard1128 We couldn't agree with you more, Justin! Bring your friends in, we'd love to see them too! :) @e_morgan20 OK friends, who can help our pal, with a McD's run? Any takers? @__SlimJD__ Who’s going to step up to the plate? Be our friend’s MVP today! :) @kiernicole61016 Kierstin, sounds like he has great taste! We always love being a part of your morning! @TJTropea Thanks for having lunch with us, TJ! Hope everything was delicious! @arielcx13 We think it would be cool to see you in our drive-thru. Better yet, come on in! @SuzannaxBorejko Sounds like true love to us! Hope to see you two soon! @AutSmolenski8 That's what we like to hear, pal! Hope you stop by for more magical meals with us! <3 @AlyssaAntal Alyssa, what’s holding you back? Come by for a visit with your friends! @B_mxxc Don't let the moment pass by today, friend. Come for a visit. It would be a great decision! @EmBlidyx18 RUN, don’t walk, to the nearest McDonald’s! You deserve a delightful meal, Emmy. @LynnnDANG That's some serious high praise. Lynn! Does this mean we'll be seeing more of you? @Kieranobriennx You deserve nothing but the best! Thanks for visiting us! @Trpaynee Thanks for having your most important meal of the day with us, Tiffany! We can't wait to have more breakfast moments with you. @pinalishver_ Well, aren’t you just the sweetest! We hope this means you'll stop by for more visits, Pinal! :) @kathythedrummer Now that's some high-honor, Katie! We hope you stop by again! We always love seeing you. <3 @rachel_kornish Thanks for stopping by, Rachel! Hope you enjoyed your meal! @Maarisadee What an honor! We are glad you love them as much as we do, friend. @jordanksomethin Welcome home, Jordan! Thanks for having us over for dinner! @mpasttt Who's up for an awesome adventure with Mia? This will be one amazing trip. The end results are delicious! @spensertorman No way, we think you're awesome! We can't wait to see you again! @AllisonHinze RUN, don’t walk, to the nearest McDonald’s! You deserve a delightful meal, Allie. @Kaylaashleigh15 Thanks for the visit! Seeing you was the highlight of our day! @SabSciannantena We could sure use a visit from you, Sabrina! Stop by sometime today with your friends. @christen_snyder Thanks for stopping by, Christen! Hope your mom feels better! @J_Peraino Awesome! We would love to see you! @clay_clay_18 We love YOU! Thanks for being an awesome fan! @emz_riley Sounds like a delicious friendship! We can't wait to see you two again! @GaviinTy *blushing* Why thank you! We can't seem to get enough of you either! @AundreaCozad Thanks for the visit! Seeing you was the highlight of our day! @lolwhyamihere Thanks for hanging out with us! We can't wait to see you again! @TayTayHuggies Best. Coworker. Ever! Hope you enjoyed your treat! @markcos69 We feel the same way about you! Thanks for visiting us! @Christinee_21 Thanks for being awesome! We love seeing you, Christine! @vickivale_89 We love that tradition! Thanks for stopping by and safe travels! @kaykeyes_ We're lovin' your dedication! Thanks for being a fan! @Curtiskam Thanks for stopping by, Curtis! Hope everything was delicious! @mikaela_jo1 *air high-five* We love seeing you! @sarah_stancato4 You deserve nothing but the best! Thanks for being awesome, Sarah! @devinecasanova Adulting has never tasted so good! Thanks for having lunch with us! @middlemas___ Give your mum a high-five! Sharing delicious moments with you always makes us happy! @Zignasty96 You deserve nothing but the best! Thanks for being a fan! @timgardner__ Aww we’re so happy you feel that way! There will never be a time when we’re not happy to see you. :) @Fae_Lynne Woo-hoo! Thanks for stopping by, Jessica! We always love seeing you! @JustRelaxKidd Of course! Your happiness means the world to us! @_cateypriddy_ *blushing* Thanks for being a SWEETIE! We can't wait to see you again! @lo_gustina Who’s going to step up? Be our friend's hero today! :) @tina_schwenke The feeling is mutual, Tina! Stop by anytime; we’d love to see you! @Dwhiting96 OK friends, who can help our pal, with a McD's run? Any takers? @megator93 Your cravings are on point! Hang with us and your friends, Megan! @K_Bateey Come on by — we have plenty to share! :) @_teamtanya_ RUN, don’t walk, to the nearest McDonald’s! @_TeeChelle What a coincidence! All we want is to see your awesome face! Stop by tonight! @Madelyn_Emer We can totally help you out with that! See you soon? @nevin_sophie It's bringing back such sweet memories, Sophie! Sweet memories with you, and more of course! :) @_mamanella We’d love to see you! Promise to visit us soon? :) @insane4urmembr2 What are you waiting for, we'd love to see you! Stop by and visit us. :) @zackRnorton Sounds good to us! We can't wait to see you! @_PrettyMuchMe OK friends, who can help our pal, with a McD's run? Any takers? @GalaxyVui Awesome! Thanks for being a fan! @_johnson45 Who’s going to step up to the plate? Be our friend’s MVP today! :) @poohbie_nicole3 What a coincidence! All we want is to see your awesome face! Visit us soon? @JustChloooay We can both agree that you need to stop on by and treat yourself! You deserve it, Chloe. @chigga01 Woo-hoo! We always love when we get to be a part of your day! <3 @imjon You're living your best life, Jon! Here's to more moments like this with you! <3 @_babygirlASW We think it would be cool to see you in our drive-thru, pal. Better yet, come on in! @cyoungmane McD's always sounds good, Cy! Does this mean we'll be seeing you and your friends shortly? :) @sunflowrmendes We're raising our hand, Julia! We'd love to join you. See you in a bit? @heartshoshi What a great reward, Alex! We can't wait to see you! <3 @jackie_bergan What a great thing to be thinking about, Jackie! Does that mean, we’ll be seeing you soon? @annsaramason What are you waiting for? We'd love to see you today! @nouziie They say good things come to those who wait–but everyone knows even better things come to those who act fast! See you soon? @emmasanchez244 Oh, the anticipation! Can't wait to see you, Emma! @Dustman2015 We like the way you think! Come on over and celebrate Fry-day with us! @rob_tread What are you waiting for, we'd love to see you! Stop by and visit us. :) @autumnkindred01 Did anyone step up? Come on by when you can, we would love to see you for breakfast! @Lamebutgreat Awesome! Thanks for being a fry fanatic! @AllisonnnK The word "no" isn't in our vocabulary when it comes to tasteful treats, Allison! We're always here to bring you the best! :) @ShannaLindsey2 We're glad to always have your back, Shanna! Here's to more mouthwatering moments with you! <3 @m_dziergas You have your priorities in check, Michelle! Keep your eye on the prize and don't let it out of your sight. :) @chanelnotbr4ve Thanks for reaching out! Unfortunately we can’t review outside ideas, as McDonald’s internal policies do not allow it. @meggaaaan Who's ready to grab their keys and get Megan her favorite McFlurry? @redbootsbaby We'll always be here for you, Tami! Feel better!
